description: FieldMap configuration for IKE-BOT automation scenarios

_notes.binder_outbox_folder_id: Google Drive folder where new binder PDFs are uploaded
_notes.binder_archive_folder_id: Google Drive folder where processed binders are archived
_notes.evidence_upload_folder_id: Google Drive folder for evidence file uploads

_notes.db_cases_id: Notion database containing case records with CaseID property
_notes.db_evidence_id: Notion database for Evidence Log entries
_notes.db_queue_id: Notion database for automation queue/workflow tracking

_notes.alerts_channel: Slack channel for critical alerts and errors

_notes.binder_complete: Webhook URL for binder completion notifications
_notes.evidence_upload: Webhook URL for evidence upload events
_notes.case_update: Webhook URL for case update events

_setup_instructions.step_1: Replace all REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_* placeholders with actual IDs
_setup_instructions.step_2: Upload this file to Google Drive
_setup_instructions.step_3: Copy the file ID from the Google Drive URL
_setup_instructions.step_4: Use this file ID in Make scenario Module 3 (Download FieldMap)
_setup_instructions.step_5: Update settings as needed for your specific use case

_how_to_find_ids.google_drive_folder_id: Open folder in browser, copy ID from URL: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/[FOLDER_ID]
_how_to_find_ids.notion_database_id: Open database in browser, copy ID from URL: https://notion.so/[DATABASE_ID]?v=...
_how_to_find_ids.slack_channel_id: Right-click channel → View channel details → Copy channel ID from bottom of details panel
